ygData.subject: Re: magic only creatures - my solution and question
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of Unrest...what levels of characters should adventure in Unrest? I have never been there, but love attacking the Undead.  I am level 20 and have both
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of Unrest...what levels of characters should adventure in Unrest?

I have never been there, but love attacking the Undead. I am level 20 and
have both the Shiny Brass Halberd and the Polished Granite Tomahawk as well
as the Darkwood shield and love bashing ghouls, magic spawn and undead. Is
Unrest worth it?

Grod
Paladin 20th Level
Innoruuk



Newly armed with my enchanted arsenal, I took my
wizard and myself to Unrest and have since comenced to
group with others to beat back the hordes of undead
that spawn from the depths of the evil that is the
Estate of Unrest. And I'll tell you, it's a lot of
fun to fight with every shot going off while around me
dual wielding warriors and rangers, and other
paladins, are hitting with their offhands, or kicking
or bashing, for INVULNERABLE results.
